EmailTemplate.subject: 2019/2020 Calendars & Planners Still Available
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Keep Your Time On Track
There’s still time to get your 2020 calendars & planners. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/sites/gt/login.aspx?URL=/EN/search/pages/category/2020-Calendars-Planners/_/N-agh?cmp=EBFGTIMEMANAGEMENT19EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Shop your planning style. Planners
